Treatment options for recurrent Burkitt and Burkitt-like lymphoma/leukemia    Treatment options for recurrent Burkitt and Burkitt-like non-Hodgkin lymphoma /leukemia may include:            -  Combination chemotherapy and targeted therapy (rituximab).     -  High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell transplant with the patient's own cells or cells from a donor.     - Targeted therapy with a bispecific antibody.
